code: import React from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{Button,ButtonGroup}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LanguageSwitcher(){const{i18n}=useTranslation();const changeLanguage=lng=>{i18n.changeLanguage(lng);};const currentLang=i18n.language;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ButtonGroup,{size:"small",variant:"outlined",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("vi"),variant:currentLang==="vi"?"contained":"outlined",sx:{minWidth:"40px",fontSize:"12px"},children:"VI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("en"),variant:currentLang==="en"?"contained":"outlined",sx:{minWidth:"40px",fontSize:"12px"},children:"EN"})]});}
